name: CODETAIN
tagline: Web and mobile app software experts
description: We are an agile team of web developing experts. Do you need a frontend React expert with excellent Node.js backend knowledge or a senior Ruby on Rails backend developer with strong Angular.js frontend skills? We always match the best-fit developer(s) to your specific requirements.
